name: Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets
description: In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: intel core i3-2400 CPU 2.40GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GT 640 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: i5-4170 3.70 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
